mapper.select:
select id, realname, broker_mobile, avatar from 20171206fangchan.fke_broker_info where 1 = 1
and (realname like concat(concat('%',#{username}),'%') or broker_mobile like concat(concat('%',#{username}),'%'))
and is_broker = '1' order by id
